Text:
this movie is a pile of shit, according to flixster

A: 9

Well it was OK for a kids movie I guess. A little too much story setup for my taste.

Ends with setup for part 2. Too bad since you're told basically throughout to expect all of 4. hint hint

Flixter is a pile of shit, according to me.

I always wonder how can you rip a movie, 2 weeks before its release :D
